27  """Functionallity to synchronize elements from the camelot database against 
28  other databases 
29  """ 
30   
31  from camelot.model import * 
32  from elixir.ext.associable import * 
33   
34  __metadata__ = metadata 
35   
36  from camelot.view.elixir_admin import EntityAdmin 
37  import datetime 
38     

39 -class Synchronized(Entity): 

40    using_options(tablename='synchronized') 
41    database = Field(Unicode(30), index=True) 
42    tablename = Field(Unicode(30), index=True) 
43    primary_key = Field(Integer(), index=True) 
44    last_update = Field(DateTime(), index=True, default=datetime.datetime.now, onupdate=datetime.datetime.now) 

45     
46  is_synchronized = associable(Synchronized) 
47
